summary: An ex-CIA agent (Kathy Gallagher) living in Indonesia tracks Ludvig Hauptman, the arms dealer who killed her husband. Along the way, she meets a young boy and his grandfather, who teach her in the ways of the Lady Dragon.
cast: Cynthia Rothrock|Richard Norton|Robert Ginty|Bella Esperance|Hengky Tornando|Thomas Forcher|Pitradjaya Burnama|Advent Bangun|Diaz Tangkilisan|H.I.M. Damsyik|Henry Surentu|Syarief Friant|Edward Rehwinkle|Sam S.|Tanaka|Atek Darmo|Ricky Hosada|Feilung Efendy|Agus Mukhlis|Gino Makasutji|Rony S.S.|Herman Iskandar|Johny Matakena|Christine|Lydia Febriani|Ruby Rimba|Yongky|Panji Dharma|Endang|Eddy Marthias|Anto Chaniago|Abdul Rozak|Hendro Tangkilisan|Ginda|Anton|Sonny|Ardi|Umar Bani|Yongki Tan|Asep Libar|Budi|Sulis|Surip|Rajiman|Bokir|Karsiman Gada|Silvia Sitha Dewi|Linda|Ita Tanjung|Angela Veiny
keywords: rape|female fighter|groom dies at wedding day|wise mentor|alliteration
title: Lady Dragon
